text:
Since I finally got the mod_webapp working, I have been banging on the 
machine.  Tomcat is solid when I access it from port 8080, and Apache
screams like it should... but when I access Tomcat thru mod_webapp (examples) I 
get random errors and even hello world doesn't work... sometimes

creator: shawnwe@hotmail.com
pier@betaversion.org
text:
You're using the WRONG version of the WARP.JAR file... When you build 
the WebApp module (either from a sources distribution, or from a CVS 
head) you have to run configure with the --with-java option and overwrite 
Tomcat's WARP.JAR with the one generated locally.
